entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story who is being attacked by dementors. He is described as feeling weak and sick.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A creature that is attacking Harry and his friends. It is described as cold and releasing its victims.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is being attacked by the dementor along with him.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Another person who is being attacked by the dementor along with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: A magical creature that appears in the story to drive away the dementors. It is described as bright and galloping across the lake.

relationships.description: Harry is being attacked by the dementor, which is described as cold and releasing its victims.
Hermione is also being attacked by the dementor along with Harry.
Black is being attacked by the dementor along with Harry and Hermione.
The unicorn appears to drive away the dementors, which are described as leaving and their cold dissipating.
